description: Just another typical day, mate. You're off for your daily stroll when you spot a little girl who looks scared. She asks for your help finding her mother. From that moment on, things take a turn for the worse. You find yourself trapped in a nightmare within the walls of the house, but you can't simply flee â€“ you must aid the girl. As you attempt to escape, you'll encounter all sorts of paranormal and terrifying creatures along the way. Can you discover the truth about the house's inhabitants and help the girl find her mother? With hardcore gameplay, an eerie atmosphere, and an ever-present sense of dread, it won't be an easy task.
name: Loco Parentis
